channel.title: World Of DUGI - Npc graphical rework!
channel.description:
Hello, Welcome to my Reworked npc's Thread! I will post progress of my npc's here also! Suggestions about the next monster i should make are welcome! (When im busy on a npc i will show you here on which one)
Next up: [B]NOTING! I NEED SUGGESTIONS! WHAT MONSTER WILL I MAKE? POST.[/B]
THIS WAS MADE JUST FOR MY SERVER [url=http://www.wod2.webs.com/play.hrml]World of DUGI[/url]
Suggestions about other monsters are Welcome
Zamorak Godwars boss ftw?: [img]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg24/pkhere/Demonking.jpg[/img]
New Bears: [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg24/pkhere/Newbears.png[/img]
New Guards: [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg24/pkhere/Newguard.png[/img] [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg24/pkhere/Newguard2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg24/pkhere/Newguard3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg24/pkhere/Newguard4.png[/img]
Kalphite queen: [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg24/pkhere/KQ1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg24/pkhere/KQ2.png[/img]
Dark beast: [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg24/pkhere/Darkbeast.png[/img]
Giant Rat: [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg24/pkhere/Giantrat.png[/img]
Lesser Demon/Greater demon: [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg24/pkhere/Lesserdemon2-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg24/pkhere/Lesserdemon1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i244.photobucket.com/albums/gg24/pkhere/Greaterdemon.png[/img]

kingman002:

Where do I play this? (respond or you’re gay)

www.worldofdugi.com

item.title: World Of DUGI - Npc graphical rework!
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“nwe luigi2, post:13, topic:310737”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=407164.msg3009627#msg3009627 date=1256677315]

Fuck all delta scape sources, I’m not using anything delta scape related… seriously delta scape is one of the worst bases ever

Stfu and learn your facts. Delta is a GOOD base. Its just way to jumple, shitty coding, clean it out. Its a good base. If you know combat. Redo the range/mage like i did. And its a good easy ass base.
[/quote][quote author=Explisionist link=topic=407164.msg3009641#msg3009641 date=1256677809]

Fuck all delta scape sources, I’m not using anything delta scape related… seriously delta scape is one of the worst bases ever

Stfu and learn your facts. Delta is a GOOD base. Its just way to jumple, shitty coding, clean it out. Its a good base. If you know combat. Redo the range/mage like i did. And its a good easy ass base.

Why don’t you stfu and learn your facts first.

Deltascape is based off of Devolution released by bakatool. Delta coded it as if he were teaching a idiot how to make a server. Sure if you clean it out its okay, reason why? Because you making it Devolution again when u clean it.

Ontopic: Good start, would love to see more of it.
[/quote]
Any WinterLove based server is bad… the creator of it said it himself… Go learn a new type of source like RS2HD or Hyperion[/quote]
Hyperion, i would agree. Its extremely stable.
But like i said. Delta when he worked on it. He made it 50x more stable then Dev.
You make it better, making new handlers instead of cramming everything in main class.

Read full topic
